entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:06 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 10:45 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.8°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -18.3°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 70 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
